nodes.text: Revan's Sith lightsaber was the weapon used by the Jedi-turned-Sith Lord Darth Revan. He used it before and during his reign as the Dark Lord of the Sith. It was destroyed when Darth Malak fired on his Master's ship.

Revan first used this weapon during the later years of the Mandalorian Wars and wielded it against Mandalore the Ultimate. After being turned to the dark side by the Sith Emperor Revan kept the saber as his weapon however he replaced the original blue crystal with a synthetic crimson one. During the Jedi Civil War, Revan used this weapon against the Jedi Order. Most notably, it saw use when Bastila Shan led a strike team to capture the Dark Lord. The weapon was destroyed when Malak fired on Revan's ship, nearly killing the Dark Lord.
In both Knights of the Old Republic games, all characters that wield a standard lightsaber share the same hilt as Revan's Sith lightsaber.
